channel.title: Posts on Richard Klein
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Richard Klein

item.title: Many Labs 2 Under Review
item.description: The Many Labs 2 project (https://osf.io/8cd4r/) has been submitted and is under review at AMPPS. Overall, 28 psychology studies were replicated across >120 samples from 34 countries around the world, totalling >15,000 participants. Public release of the results/manuscript/data should occur shortly, pending final revisions and alongside commentaries from original authors.

item.title: Sample Post
item.description: Trying Something New This is a new page built in the Blogdown R Package, uploaded to GitHub, and knitted by Netlify. Some sample code below demonstrating cool things we can do in Blogdown. R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this:
